definition.text: The Jurik filter moving average is an adaptive smoother that provides a filtered average that is both responsive and lag free.

paragraphs.text: The indicator uses a Jurik-filtered moving average that acts as both a baseline and a support and resistance indicator. The Jurik filter is an adaptive smoothing process which helps reduces lag while simultaneously smoothing the input data.
The following properties are available to access:

| Product Name | Product Variable | Properties |
| JurikFilter | JF | value |
The parameters of the indicator's calculations can be changed by locating and opening the Javascript Code under Data Building Procedure -> Procedure Loop under "Jurik Filter" Procedure Loop.
